comments:
When calling project.build() for a project with external builders the class
org.eclipse.ui.externaltools.internal.model.VariableContextManager is instantiated.

The constructor of this class has the lines:

IWorkbench workbench = PlatformUI.getWorkbench();
workbench.addWindowListener(this);

which cause a NPE in headless mode (since workbench will be null)

Here is a partial stack trace:

java.lang.NullPointerException
